Someone might be able to tell me, but I can't remember this awful, sexist movie, but Clint Eastwood asks a nun if she ever lays in bed at night thinking of men. She says no. Then he smiles. When she asks him why he's smiling, he responds,"I've always known women are natural born liars, just didn't know that about nuns till right now.". gross.

As a kid I was never afraid of people and making new friends, one of the first friends I ever had was a black girl. I even had a lot of black friends in high school! But now...I have become more disconnected from black people. I definitely get less contact with them, and I feel it's such a shame.
